events.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. events.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
events.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979  and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal  as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.
